price: 不信后世者，有恶例；安拉有典型。他确是全能的，确是至睿的。
arabic: لِلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ مَثَلُ ٱلسَّوۡءِۖ وَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡمَثَلُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lilladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati mathalu al-sawi walillahi al-mathalu al-aʿlā wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
